Process.title: Plan
Process.description: We’ll sit down  with you (figuratively, not literally) to understand the details of your project idea and discuss how we can turn your dreams into reality.

Process.title: Design
Process.description: We’ll then mock-up your entire user experience from scratch in one of those fancy designer programs, so we can sculpt it into a masterpiece.

Process.title: Architect
Process.description: While our designers are at work, our engineers will be working on your apps architecture. This is the invisible structure that ensures everything runs smoothly and is 100% secure.

Process.title: Build
Process.description: We'll then write some of the most beautiful code you’ve ever seen. We follow strict guidelines and everything is fully documented - giving you a solid foundation to build on.

Process.title: Test
Process.description: Meanwhile, we’re creating automated tests that we run to prevent any small changes from breaking the app and causing 'help desk hell' for your team.

Process.title: Launch
Process.description: Finally, we’re ready for deployment (aka launch). Since a good app is more than just a pile of source code on GitHub - much of the user experience comes from a proper deployment process.

Process.title: Upgrade
Process.description: Once your product is live, it's rarely complete! The way to dominate your industry is to continually get feedback from your users and improve faster than the competition.
